content.description:
Troglodyte climbs an undercut bulge on good rock over a great landing.

Sit start deep under the overhang with a left hand on a block-gaston at the break and a right hand and heel hook in the large hueco. From there, grab a right hand crimp, stick a left hand three-finger pocket, right hand to a sloper edge, make a blind toss around the bulge to a left hand edge, then mantle onto the slab, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is flat and even.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Xeriscape.

content.description:
Saga City Seance traverses a featured lip on good rock over an equally good landing.

Stand start with hands matched on a flat edge. From there, place a left heel, cross over with the left hand to an edge, reach a pocket-edge at the corner, let the feet go, then either campus right across the edges or use a right heel hook to reach the good edges on the slab, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work fine. The first few moves climb near a rock, but it doesn't really affect the landing.
content.location: It climbs the south-east face of Xeriscape.
